Episodes.Title: Rebirth
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: After the events of Over The Wild Green Yonder, Leela is put in an irreversible coma. Fry must find a way to cope with his loss, so he builds a robotic Leela.

Episodes.Title: In-A-Gadda-Da-Leela
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Zapp and Leela are alone on an unknown planet after their mission to destroy a death star fails, while the rest of the gang tries to save Earth from being the star's next victim.

Episodes.Title: Attack of the Killer App
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Patric M. Verrone
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry and Bender compete to see who can get the most fans on their Twitter-like application on their new eyePhones, not knowing that it's actually part of Mom's evil conspiracy to unleash a new virus on people's brains.

Episodes.Title: Proposition Infinity
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Michael Rowe
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Amy gets together with Bender after Kif breaks up with her, which catches the ire of Dr. Farnsworth and others who oppose human-robot relationships.

Episodes.Title: The Duh-Vinci Code
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Maiya Williams
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Professor Farnsworth accidentally uncovers the blueprint for a mysterious Leonardo da Vinci invention, and he and his crew travel to Rome for answers.

Episodes.Title: Lethal Inspection
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Horsted
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Bender discovers that he has no backup capabilities--meaning that he is mortal, and he and Hermes travel to Mexico so that he can take out his frustrations on his inspector.

Episodes.Title: The Late Philip J. Fry
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Lew Morton
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry agrees to travel one minute into the future in Farnsworth's new time machine right before a big date with Leela, but they wind up going far into the future with no way to go back in time.

Episodes.Title: That Darn Katz!
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Josh Weinstein
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: A sinister cat uses Amy's failed dissertation to launch his plan to save his home planet by destroying Earth.

Episodes.Title: A Clockwork Origin
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Dan Vebber
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: After a dispute with creationists, Farnsworth flees with the others to a remote, uninhabited planet. Upon releasing microrobots in a pond, non-organic life begins to evolve on the planet.

Episodes.Title: The Prisoner of Benda
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The Professor's body swapping experiment produces a result he didn't have in mind.

Episodes.Title: Lrrreconcilable Ndndifferences
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Patric M. Verrone
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Lrrr is being pressured to conquer Earth.

Episodes.Title: The Mutants Are Revolting
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Horsted
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry accidentally reveals that Leela is a mutant, so she is banished to the sewers where all mutants must live. Not willing to accept this, Leela and Fry organize the mutant uprising against this segregation.

Episodes.Title: The Futurama Holiday Spectacular
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Michael Rowe
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Three separate holiday stories: X-mas, Robanaca and Kwanzaa. 1. Once more Robot Santa comes to town. Besides the violence he spreads, this time he sings to the crew of the pine tree that are needed for a proper "X-mas". The only p...
